data.message: Ignoring God's laws always works out well.

replies.message: How about the part of the Bible that says his followers should obey the law of the land first and foremost. But mostly, guess what? God never said anything to anyone and the Bible was written by MEN!
^^^ inspired by God!  Finish the sentence please.

The bible was written by men, but inspired by the Holy Spirit. The spiritual world is more real than the material one. Thats why you feel more stuff than what you see. God loves us sinners, but won't tolerate our sin.

Leviticus 19:19 - Do not wear clothing woven of two kinds of material.

Uh oh, guess who's going to hell...
I know right? If you take a look you will see the least religious countries have more quality of life.
No, the bible was not "inspired"... anyone who believes it was is delusional and extremely ignorant of history.
Ignoring YOUR god has always worked for me :)

Niki, it didn't say first. It said follow the law of the land but more importantly follow God's law.
Stephen, that's just false, the U.S. is highly religious and has great standard of living when compared to most of the rest of the world.
Hanyewi, you called me "delusional and extremely ignorant of history" which isn't very nice. I don't think there's any way you can justify the delusional part, but how am I ignorant of history?
